sentences: He has won thrice the Producer of the Year Awards at New England Music Awards in 2013, 2018 and 2019.
He also won the Studio Producer of the Year Award at Boston Music Awards in 2019.
McLaughlin founded 37 ’Productions, a music recording studio based in Boston, in 2004.

He has worked with a variety of bands and musicians, including Matchbox Twenty, Queensrÿche, Rush, Dirty Vegas, Sarah Blacker, Kristen Merlin, Yoan Garneau, Rafael Moreira, Dark New Day, Elliott Smith, Death Row Records, among many others.
